GV05chup___u:1010: sa vāyunā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca |
GV05chup___u:1011: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda ||
GV05chup___u:1013: sa ādityena jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca |
GV05chup___u:1014: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda ||
GV05chup___u:1016: sa digbhir jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca |
GV05chup___u:1017: bhāti ca tapati ca kīrtyā yaśasā brahmavarcasena ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda
GV05chup___u:1026: te āṇḍakapāle rajataṃ ca suvarṇaṃ cābhavatām || ChUp_3,19.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1032: yad vāsteyam udakaṃ sa samudraḥ || ChUp_3,19.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1033: atha yat tad ajāyata so 'sāv ādityaḥ |
GV05chup___u:1034: taṃ jāyamānaṃ ghoṣā ulūlavo 'nūdatiṣṭhant sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmāḥ |
GV05chup___u:1035: tasmāt tasyodayaṃ prati pratyāyanaṃ prati ghoṣā ulūlavo 'nūttiṣṭhanti
GV05chup___u:1036: sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmāḥ || ChUp_3,19.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1037: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān ādityaṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chup___u:1038: abhyāśo ha yad enaṃ sādhavo ghoṣā ā ca gaccheyur upa ca nimreḍeran nimreḍeran || ChUp_3,19.4
GV05chup___u:1039: jānaśrutir ha pautrāyaṇaḥ śraddhādeyo bahudāyī bahupākya āsa |
GV05chup___u:1040: sa ha sarvata āvasathān māpayāṃ cakre sarvata eva me 'nnam atsyantīti ||
GV05chup___u:1043: ho ho 'yi bhallākṣa bhallākṣa jānaśruteḥ pautrāyaṇasya samaṃ divā jyotir ātataṃ tan mā prasāṅkṣīs tat tvāṃ mā pradhākṣīr iti || ChUp_4,1.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1044: tam u ha paraḥ pratyuvāca kam v ara enam etat santaṃ sayugvānam iva raikvam āttha iti |
GV05chup___u:1045: yo nu kathaṃ sayugvā raikva iti || ChUp_4,1.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1046: yathā kṛtāya vijitāyādhareyāḥ saṃyanty evam enaṃ sarvaṃ tad abhisameti yat kiṃca prajāḥ sādhu kurvanti |
GV05chup___u:1047: yas tad veda yat sa veda sa mayaitad ukta iti || ChUp_4,1.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1048: tad u ha jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇa upaśuśrāva |
GV05chup___u:1049: sa ha saṃjihāna eva kṣattāram uvācāṅgāre ha sayugvānam iva raikvam āttheti |
GV05chup___u:1050: yo nu kathaṃ sayugvā raikva iti || ChUp_4,1.5 ||
GV05chup___u:1051: yathā kṛtāya vijitāyādhareyāḥ saṃyanty evam enaṃ sarvaṃ tad abhisameti yat kiṃca prajāḥ sādhu kurvanti |
GV05chup___u:1052: yas tad veda yat sa veda sa mayaitad ukta iti || ChUp_4,1.6 ||
GV05chup___u:1053: sa ha kṣattānviṣya nāvidam iti pratyeyāya |
GV05chup___u:1054: taṃ hovāca yatrāre brāhmaṇasyānveṣaṇā tad enam arccheti || ChUp_4,1.7 ||
GV05chup___u:1056: taṃ hābhyuvāda tvaṃ nu bhagavaḥ sayugvā raikva iti |
GV05chup___u:1057: ahaṃ hy arā 3 iti ha pratijajñe |
GV05chup___u:1058: sa ha kṣattāvidam iti pratyeyāya || ChUp_4,1.8 ||
GV05chup___u:1059: tad u ha jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ ṣaṭ śatāni gavāṃ niṣkam aśvatarīrathaṃ tad ādāya praticakrame
GV05chup___u:1061: raikvemāni ṣaṭ śatāni gavām ayaṃ niṣko 'yam aśvatarīrathaḥ |
GV05chup___u:1062: anu ma etāṃ bhagavo devatāṃ śādhi yāṃ devatām upāssa iti || ChUp_4,2.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1063: tam u ha paraḥ pratyuvācāha hāretvā śūdra tavaiva saha gobhir astv iti |
GV05chup___u:1064: tad u ha punar eva jānaśrutiḥ pautrāyaṇaḥ sahasraṃ gavāṃ niṣkam aśvatarīrathaṃ duhitaraṃ tad ādāya praticakrame || ChUp_4,2.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1066: raikvedaṃ sahasraṃ gavām ayaṃ niṣko 'yam aśvatarīratha iyaṃ jāyāyaṃ grāmo yasminn āsse 'nv eva mā bhagavaḥ śādhīti || ChUp_4,2.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1067: tasyā ha mukham upodgṛhṇann uvācājahāremāḥ śūdrānenaiva mukhenālāpayiṣyathā iti |
GV05chup___u:1068: te haite raikvaparṇā nāma mahāvṛṣeṣu yatrāsmā uvāsa |
GV05chup___u:1071: yadā vā agnir udvāyati vāyum evāpyeti |
GV05chup___u:1073: yadā candro 'stam eti vāyum evāpyeti || ChUp_4,3.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1079: sa yadā svapiti prāṇam eva vāg apy eti |
GV05chup___u:1083: prāṇo hy evaitān sarvān saṃvṛṅkta iti || ChUp_4,3.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1085: vāyur eva deveṣu prāṇaḥ prāṇeṣu || ChUp_4,3.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1086: atha ha śaunakaṃ ca kāpeyam abhipratāriṇaṃ ca kākṣaseniṃ pariviṣyamāṇau brahmacārī bibhikṣe
GV05chup___u:1087: tasmā u ha na dadatuḥ || ChUp_4,3.5 ||
GV05chup___u:1089: mahātmanaś caturo deva ekaḥ kaḥ sa jagāra bhuvanasya gopāḥ |
GV05chup___u:1090: taṃ kāpeya nābhipaśyanti martyā abhipratārin bahudhā vasantam |
GV05chup___u:1091: yasmai vā etad annaṃ tasmā etan na dattam iti || ChUp_4,3.6 ||
GV05chup___u:1092: tad u ha śaunakaḥ kāpeyaḥ pratimanvānaḥ pratyeyāya |
GV05chup___u:1093: ātmā devānāṃ janitā prajānāṃ hiraṅyadaṃṣṭro babhaso 'nasūriḥ |
GV05chup___u:1094: mahāntam asya mahimānam āhur anadyamāno yad anannam atti |
GV05chup___u:1095: iti vai vayam brahmacārin nedam upāsmahe dattāsmai bhikṣām iti ||
GV05chup___u:1097: te vā ete pañcānye pañcānye daśa santas tat kṛtam |
GV05chup___u:1098: tasmāt sarvāsu dikṣv annam eva daśa kṛtam |
GV05chup___u:1101: sarvam asya idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavaty annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda ya evaṃ veda
GV05chup___u:1102: satyakāmo ha jābālo jabālāṃ mātaram āmantrayāṃ cakre |
GV05chup___u:1103: brahmacaryaṃ bhavati vivatsyāmi kiṃgotro nv aham asmīti || ChUp_4,4.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1105: nāham etad veda tāta yadgotras tvam asi |
GV05chup___u:1106: bahv aham carantī paricāriṇī yauvane tvām alabhe |
GV05chup___u:1107: sāham etan na veda yadgotras tvam asi |
GV05chup___u:1110: sa satyakāma eva jābālo bruvīthā iti || ChUp_4,4.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1116: nāham etad veda bho yadgotro 'ham asmi |
GV05chup___u:1118: sā mā pratyabravīd bahv aham carantī paricariṇī yauvane tvām alabhe |
GV05chup___u:1119: sāham etan na veda yadgotras tvam asi |
GV05chup___u:1122: so 'haṃ satyakāmo jābālo 'smi bho iti || ChUp_4,4.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1126: upa tvā neṣye na satyād agā iti |
GV05chup___u:1127: tam upanīya kṛśānām abalānāṃ catuḥśatā gā nirākṛtya uvācemāḥ somyānusaṃvrajeti |
GV05chup___u:1136: brahmaṇaś ca te pādaṃ bravāṇi iti |
GV05chup___u:1143: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān nāma || ChUp_4,5.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1144: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān ity upāste prakāśavān asmiṃl loke bhavati |
GV05chup___u:1145: prakāśavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇaḥ prakāśavān ity upāste || ChUp_4,5.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1147: sa ha śvo bhūte gā abhiprasthāpayāṃ cakāra |
GV05chup___u:1148: tā yatrābhisāyaṃ babhūvus tatrāgnim upasamādhāya gā uparudhya samidham ādhāya paścād agneḥ prāṅ upopaviveśa || ChUp_4,6.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1158: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇo 'nantavān nāma || ChUp_4,6.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1159: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo 'nantavān ity upāste 'nantavān asmiṃl loke bhavati |
GV05chup___u:1160: anantavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo 'nantavān ity upāste || ChUp_4,6.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1168: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān nāma || ChUp_4,7.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1169: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān ity upāste jyotiṣmān asmiṃl loke bhavati |
GV05chup___u:1170: jyotiṣmato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇo jyotiṣmān ity upāste madguṣṭe pādaṃ vakteti |
GV05chup___u:1171: sa ha śvo bhūte gā abhiprasthāpayāṃ cakāra |
GV05chup___u:1172: tā yatrābhisāyaṃ babhūvus tatrāgnim upasamādhāya gā uparudhya samidham ādhāya paścād agneḥ prāṅ upopaviveśa || ChUp_4,8.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1182: eṣa vai somya catuṣkalaḥ pādo brahmaṇa āyatanavān nāma || ChUp_4,8.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1183: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇa āyatanavān ity upāsta āyatanavān asmiṃl loke bhavati |
GV05chup___u:1184: āyatanavato ha lokāñ jayati ya etam evaṃ vidvāṃś catuṣkalaṃ pādaṃ brahmaṇa āyatanavān ity upāste || ChUp_4,8.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1191: bhagavāṃs tv eva me kāme brūyāt || ChUp_4,9.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1192: śrutaṃ hy eva me bhagavaddṛśebhya ācāryād dhaiva vidyā viditā sādhiṣṭhaṃ prāpatīti |
GV05chup___u:1194: atra ha na kiṃcana vīyāyeti vīyāyeti || ChUp_4,9.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1195: upakosalo ha vai kāmalāyanaḥ satyakāme jābāle brahmacāryam uvāsa |
GV05chup___u:1196: tasya ha dvādaśa vārṣāny agnīn paricacāra |
GV05chup___u:1197: sa ha smānyān antevāsinaḥ samāvartayaṃs taṃ ha smaiva na samāvartayati ||
GV05chup___u:1198: taṃ jāyovāca tapto brahmacārī kuśalam agnīn paricacārīt |
GV05chup___u:1205: sa ha uvāca bahava ime 'smin puruṣe kāmā nānātyāyāḥ |
GV05chup___u:1211: prāṇo brahma kaṃ brahma khaṃ brahmeti || ChUp_4,10.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1214: kaṃ ca tu khaṃ ca na vijānāmīti |
GV05chup___u:1216: yad vāva kaṃ tad eva kham |
GV05chup___u:1217: yad eva khaṃ tad eva kam iti |
GV05chup___u:1218: prāṇaṃ ca hāsmai tad ākāśaṃ cocuḥ || ChUp_4,10.5 ||
GV05chup___u:1219: atha hainaṃ gārhapatyo 'nuśaśāsa pṛthivy agnir annam āditya iti |
GV05chup___u:1220: ya eṣa āditye puruṣo dṛśyate so 'ham asmi sa eva aham asmi iti ||
GV05chup___u:1221: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste |
GV05chup___u:1227: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca |
GV05chup___u:1228: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste || ChUp_4,11.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1229: atha ha enam anvāhāryapacano 'nuśaśāsa āpo diśo nakṣatrāṇi candramā iti |
GV05chup___u:1230: ya eṣa candramasi puruṣo dṛṣyate so 'ham asmi sa eva aham asmi iti ||
GV05chup___u:1231: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste |
GV05chup___u:1237: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca |
GV05chup___u:1238: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste || ChUp_4,12.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1239: atha hainam āhavanīyo 'nuśaśāsa prāṇa ākāśo dyaur vidyud iti |
GV05chup___u:1240: ya eṣa vidyuti puruṣo dṛśyate so 'ham asmi sa evāham asmīti || ChUp_4,13.1
GV05chup___u:1241: sa ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste |
GV05chup___u:1247: upa vayaṃ taṃ bhuñjāmo 'smiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca |
GV05chup___u:1248: ya etam evaṃ vidvān upāste || ChUp_4,13.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1257: ko nu mānuśiśyād bho itīhāpeva nihnute |
GV05chup___u:1258: ime nūnam īdṛśā anyādṛśā itīhāgnīn abhyūde |
GV05chup___u:1259: kiṃ nu somya kila te 'vocann iti || ChUp_4,14.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1262: ahaṃ tu te tad vakṣyāmi yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evam evaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyata iti |
GV05chup___u:1265: ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛśyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca |
GV05chup___u:1267: tad yady apy asmin sarpir vodakaṃ vā siñcati vartmanī eva gacchati ||
GV05chup___u:1270: sarvāṇy enaṃ vāmāny abhisaṃyanti ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_4,15.2 ||
GV05chup___u:1273: sarvāṇi vāmāni nayati ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_4,15.3 ||
GV05chup___u:1276: sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti ya evaṃ veda || ChUp_4,15.4 ||
GV05chup___u:1277: atha yad u caivāsmiñ chavyaṃ kurvanti yadi ca nārciṣam evābhisaṃbhavanti |
GV05chup___u:1280: āpūryamāṇapakṣād yān ṣaḍ udaṅṅ eti māsāṃs tān |
GV05chup___u:1288: etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartante nāvartante ||
GV05chup___u:1289: eṣa ha vai yajño yo 'yaṃ pavate |
GV05chup___u:1290: eṣa ha yann idaṃ sarvaṃ punāti |
GV05chup___u:1291: yad eṣa yann idaṃ sarvaṃ punāti |
GV05chup___u:1293: tasya manaś ca vāk ca vartanī || ChUp_4,16.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1296: sa yatropākṛte prātaranuvāke purā paridhānīyāyā brahmā vyavavadati ||
GV05chup___u:1299: sa yathaikapād vrajan ratho vaikena cakreṇa vartamāno riṣyaty evam asya yajño riṣyati |
GV05chup___u:1302: atha yatra upākṛte prātaranuvāke na purā paridhānīyāyā brahmā vyavavadaty ubhe eva vartanī saṃskurvanti |
GV05chup___u:1304: sa yathobhayapād vrajan ratho vobhābhyāṃ cakrābhyāṃ vartamānaḥ pratitiṣṭhaty evam asya yajñaḥ pratitiṣṭhati yajñaṃ pratitiṣṭhantaṃ yajamāno 'nu pratitiṣṭhati |
GV05chup___u:1321: tad yady ṛkto riṣyed bhūḥ svāheti gārhapatye juhuyāt |
GV05chup___u:1322: ṛcām eva tadrasenarcāṃ vīryeṇarcāṃ yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti ||
GV05chup___u:1323: atha yadi yajuṣṭo riṣyed bhuvaḥ svāheti dakṣiṇāgnau juhuyāt |
GV05chup___u:1324: yajuṣām eva tadrasena yajuṣāṃ vīryeṇa yajuṣāṃ yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti
GV05chup___u:1325: atha yadi sāmato riṣyet svaḥ svāhety āhavanīye juhuyāt |
GV05chup___u:1326: sāmnām eva tadrasena sāmnāṃ vīryeṇa sāmnāṃ yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti ||
GV05chup___u:1328: suvarṇena rajataṃ rajatena trapu trapuṇā sīsaṃ sīsena lohaṃ lohena dāru dāru carmaṇā || ChUp_4,17.7
GV05chup___u:1329: evam eṣāṃ lokānām āsāṃ devatānām asyās trayyā vidyāyā vīryeṇa yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdadhāti
GV05chup___u:1330: bheṣajakṛto ha vā eṣa yajño yatraivaṃvid brahmā bhavati || ChUp_4,17.8 ||
GV05chup___u:1331: eṣa ha vā udakpravaṇo yajño yatraivaṃvid brahmā bhavati |
GV05chup___u:1332: evaṃvidaṃ ha vā eṣā brahmāṇam anu gāthā |
GV05chup___u:1333: yato yata āvartate tat tad gacchati || ChUp_4,17.9 ||
GV05chup___u:1336: evaṃvid dha vai brahmā yajñaṃ yajamānaṃ sarvāṃś cartvijo 'bhirakṣati |
GV05chup___u:1337: tasmād evaṃvidam eva brahmāṇaṃ kurvīta nānevaṃvidaṃ nānevaṃvidam ||
GV05chup___u:1338: yo ha vai jyeṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca veda jyeṣṭhaś ca ha vai śreṣṭhaś ca bhavati |
GV05chup___u:1339: prāṇo vāva jyeṣṭhaś ca śreṣṭhaś ca || ChUp_5,1.1 ||
GV05chup___u:1340: yo ha vai vasiṣṭhaṃ veda vasiṣṭho ha svānāṃ bhavati |
GV05chup___u:1342: yo ha vai pratiṣṭhāṃ veda prati ha tiṣṭhaty asmiṃś ca loke 'muṣmiṃś ca |
GV05chup___u:1344: yo ha vai saṃpadaṃ veda saṃ hāsmai kāmāḥ padyante daivāś ca mānuṣāś ca |
GV05chup___u:1346: yo ha vā āyatanaṃ vedāyatanaṃ ha svānāṃ bhavati |
GV05chup___u:1349: ahaṃ śreyān asmy ahaṃ śreyān asmīti || ChUp_5,1.6 ||
GV05chup___u:1350: te ha prāṇāḥ prajāpatiṃ pitaram etyocuḥ bhagavan ko naḥ śreṣṭha iti |
GV05chup___u:1352: yasmin va utkrānte śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataram iva dṛśyeta sa vaḥ śreṣṭha iti ||
GV05chup___u:1356: yathā kalā avadantaḥ prāṇantaḥ prāṇena paśyantaś cakṣuṣā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa dhyāyanto manasaivam iti |
GV05chup___u:1361: yathāndhā apaśyantaḥ prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇa dhyāyanto manasaivam iti |
GV05chup___u:1364: tat saṃvatsaraṃ proṣya paryetyovāca katham aśakatarte maj jīvitum iti |
GV05chup___u:1365: yathā badhirā aśṛṇvantaḥ prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā paśyantaś cakṣuṣā dhyāyanto manasaivam iti |
GV05chup___u:1370: yathā bālā amanasaḥ prāṇantaḥ prāṇena vadanto vācā paśyantaś cakṣuṣā śṛṇvantaḥ śrotreṇaivam iti |
GV05chup___u:1372: atha ha prāṇa uccikramiṣan sa yathā suhayaḥ paḍvīśaśaṅkūn saṃkhided evam itarān prāṇān samakhidat
GV05chup___u:1380: yad ahaṃ pratiṣṭhāsmi tvaṃ tatpratiṣṭhāsīti || ChUp_5,1.13 ||
GV05chup___u:1382: yad ahaṃ saṃpad asmi tvaṃ tatsaṃpad asīti |

GV05chup___u:2119: tejasvī vai sa tejasvato lokān bhāsvato 'pahatatamaskān abhisidhyati |
GV05chup___u:2120: yāvat tejaso gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yas tejo brahmety upāste
GV05chup___u:2123: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,11.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2125: ākāśe vai sūryācandramasāv ubhau vidyun nakṣatrāṇy agniḥ |
GV05chup___u:2135: ākāśavato vai sa lokān prakāśavato 'saṃbādhān urugāyavato 'bhisidhyati |
GV05chup___u:2136: yāvad ākāśasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati ya ākāśaṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chup___u:2139: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,12.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2141: tasmād yady api bahava āsīrann a smaranto naiva te kaṃcana śṛṇuyur na manvīran na vijānīran
GV05chup___u:2142: yadā vāva te smareyur atha śṛṇuyur atha manvīrann atha vijānīran |
GV05chup___u:2143: smareṇa vai putrān vijānāti smareṇa paśūn |
GV05chup___u:2146: yāvat smarasya gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati yaḥ smaraṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chup___u:2149: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,13.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2151: āśeddho vai smaro mantrān adhīte karmāṇi kurute putrāṃś ca paśūṃś cecchata imaṃ ca lokaṃ amuṃ cecchate |
GV05chup___u:2156: yāvad āśāyā gataṃ tatrāsya yathākāmacāro bhavati ya āśāṃ brahmety upāste |
GV05chup___u:2159: tan me bhagavān bravītv iti || ChUp_7,14.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2161: yathā vā arā nābhau samarpitā evam asmin prāṇe sarvaṃ samarpitam |
GV05chup___u:2171: sa yadi pitaraṃ vā mātaraṃ vā bhrātaraṃ vā svasāraṃ vācāryaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā kiṃcid bhṛśam iva pratyāha |
GV05chup___u:2173: pitṛhā vai tvam asi mātṛhā vai tvam asi bhrātṛhā vai tvam asi svasṛhā vai tvam asy ācāryahā vai tvam asi brāhmaṇahā vai tvam asīti || ChUp_7,15.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2174: atha yady apy enān utkrāntaprāṇāñ chūlena samāsaṃ vyatiṣaṃdahet |
GV05chup___u:2175: naivainaṃ brūyuḥ pitṛhāsīti na mātṛhāsīti na bhrātṛhāsīti na svasṛhāsīti nācāryahāsīti na brāhmaṇahāsīti || ChUp_7,15.3 ||
GV05chup___u:2177: sa vā eṣa evaṃ paśyann evaṃ manvāna evaṃ vijānann ativādī bhavati |
GV05chup___u:2181: eṣa tu vā ativadati yaḥ satyenātivadati |
GV05chup___u:2185: yadā vai vijānāty atha satyaṃ vadati |
GV05chup___u:2220: yatra nānyat paśyati nānyac chṛṇoti nānyad vijānāti sa bhūmā |
GV05chup___u:2221: atha yatrānyat paśyaty anyac chṛṇoty anyad vijānāti tad alpam |
GV05chup___u:2225: sve mahimni yadi vā na mahimnīti || ChUp_7,24.1 ||
GV05chup___u:2226: go 'śvam iha mahimety ācakṣate hastihiraṇyaṃ dāsabhāryaṃ kṣetrāṇy
GV05chup___u:2230: anyo hy anyasmin pratiṣṭhita iti || ChUp_7,24.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2231: sa evādhastāt sa upariṣṭāt sa paścāt sa purastāt sa dakṣiṇataḥ sa uttarataḥ |
GV05chup___u:2234: aham evādhastād aham upariṣṭād ahaṃ paścād ahaṃ purastād ahaṃ dakṣiṇato
GV05chup___u:2237: ātmaivādhastād ātmopariṣṭād ātmā paścād ātmā purastād ātmā dakṣiṇata ātmottarata ātmaivedaṃ sarvam iti |
GV05chup___u:2238: sa vā eṣa evaṃ paśyann evaṃ manvāna evaṃ vijānann ātmaratir ātmakrīḍa ātmamithuna ātmānandaḥ sa svarāḍ bhavati |
GV05chup___u:2240: atha ye 'nyathāto vidur anyarājānas te kṣayyalokā bhavanti |
GV05chup___u:2241: teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣv akāmacāro bhavati || ChUp_7,25.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2242: tasya ha vā etasyaivaṃ paśyata evaṃ manvānasyaivaṃ vijānata ātmataḥ prāṇa ātmata āśātmataḥ smara ātmata ākāśa ātmatas teja ātmata āpa ātmata āvirbhāvatirobhāvāv ātmato 'nnam ātmato balam ātmato vijñānam ātmato dhyānam ātmataś cittam ātmataḥ saṃkalpa ātmato mana ātmato vāg ātmato nāmātmato mantrā ātmataḥ karmāṇy ātmata evedaṃ sarvam iti || ChUp_7,26.1
GV05chup___u:2244: na paśyo mṛtyuṃ paśyati na rogaṃ nota duḥkhatām |
GV05chup___u:2245: sarvaṃ ha paśyaḥ paśyati sarvam āpnoti sarvaśaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2247: sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati pañcadhā |
GV05chup___u:2248: saptadhā navadhā caiva punaś caikādaśa smṛtaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2249: śataṃ ca daśa caikaś ca sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ |
GV05chup___u:2253: tasmai mṛditakaṣāyāya tamasas pāraṃ darśayati bhagavān sanatkumāraḥ |
GV05chup___u:2255: atha yad idam asmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminn
GV05chup___u:2257: tasmin yad antas tad anveṣṭavyaṃ tad vāva vijijñāsitavyam iti ||
GV05chup___u:2258: taṃ ced brūyur yad idam asmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminn antarākāśaḥ kiṃ tad atra vidyate yad anveṣṭavyaṃ yad vāva
GV05chup___u:2261: yāvān vā ayam ākāśas tāvān eṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2263: ubhāv agniś ca vāyuś ca sūryācandramasāv ubhau vidyun nakṣatrāṇi |
GV05chup___u:2264: yac cāsyehāsti yac ca nāsti sarvaṃ tad asmin samāhitam iti || ChUp_8,1.3
GV05chup___u:2265: taṃ ced brūyur asmiṃś cedaṃ brahmapure sarvaṃ samāhitaṃ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sarve ca kāmā yad enaj jarā vāpnoti pradhvaṃsate vā kiṃ tato 'tiśiṣyata
GV05chup___u:2268: nāsya jarayaitaj jīryati na vadhenāsya hanyate |
GV05chup___u:2269: etat satyaṃ brahmapuram asmin kāmāḥ samāhitāḥ |
GV05chup___u:2270: eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2271: yathā hy eveha prajā anvāviśanti yathānuśāsanam |
GV05chup___u:2272: yaṃ yam antam abhikāmā bhavanti yaṃ janapadaṃ yaṃ kṣetrabhāgaṃ taṃ tam evopajīvanti || ChUp_8,1.5
GV05chup___u:2273: tad yatheha karmajito lokaḥ kṣīyata evam evāmutra puṇyajito lokaḥ kṣīyate
GV05chup___u:2274: tad ya ihātmānam ananuvidya vrajanty etāṃś ca satyān kāmāṃs teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣv akāmacāro bhavati |
GV05chup___u:2275: atha ya ihātmānam anivudya vrajanty etaṃś ca satyān kāmāṃs teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati sa yadi pitṛlokakāmo bhavati |
GV05chup___u:2308: yo yo hy asyetaḥ praiti na tam iha darśanāya labhate || ChUp_8,3.1 ||
GV05chup___u:2309: atha ye cāsyeha jīvā ye ca pretā yac cānyad icchan na labhate sarvaṃ tad atra gatvā vindate
GV05chup___u:2310: atra hy asyaite satyāḥ kāmā anṛtāpidhānāḥ |
GV05chup___u:2311: tad yathāpi hiraṇyanidhiṃ nihitam akṣetrajñā upary upari sañcaranto na vindeyuḥ |
GV05chup___u:2312: evam evemāḥ sarvāḥ prajā ahar ahar gacchantya etaṃ brahmalokaṃ na vindanty anṛtena hi pratyūḍhāḥ sa vā eṣa ātmā hṛdi |
GV05chup___u:2313: tasyaitad eva niruktaṃ hṛdy ayam iti tasmād dhṛd ayam |
GV05chup___u:2314: ahar ahar vā evaṃvit svargaṃ lokam eti || ChUp_8,3.3 ||
GV05chup___u:2315: atha ya eṣa saṃprasādo 'smāc charīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpenābhiniṣpadyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca |
GV05chup___u:2317: tasya ha vā etasya brahmaṇo nāma satyam iti || ChUp_8,3.4 ||
GV05chup___u:2318: atha ya ātmā sa setur dhṛtir eṣāṃ lokānām asaṃbhedāya |
GV05chup___u:2319: naitaṃ setum ahorātre tarato na jarā na mṛtyur na śoko na sukṛtam |
GV05chup___u:2322: tasmād vā etaṃ setuṃ tīrtvā andhaḥ sann anandho bhavati |
GV05chup___u:2325: tasmād vā etaṃ setuṃ tīrtvā api naktam ahar evābhiniṣpadyate |
GV05chup___u:2326: sakṛd vibhāto hy evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ || ChUp_8,4.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2327: tad ya evaitaṃ brahmalokaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindanti teṣām evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2328: teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati || ChUp_8,4.3 ||
GV05chup___u:2329: atha yad yajña ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chup___u:2330: brahmacaryeṇa hy eva yo jñātā taṃ vindate |
GV05chup___u:2331: atha yad iṣṭam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chup___u:2333: atha yat sattrāyaṇam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chup___u:2334: brahmacaryeṇa hy eva sata ātmanas trāṇaṃ vindate |
GV05chup___u:2335: atha yan maunam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chup___u:2336: brahmacaryeṇa hy evātmānam anuvidya manute || ChUp_8,5.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2337: atha yad anāśakāyanam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chup___u:2338: eṣa hy ātmā na naśyati yaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindate |
GV05chup___u:2339: atha yad araṇyāyanam ity ācakṣate brahmacaryam eva tat |
GV05chup___u:2340: tat araś ca ha vai ṇyaś cārṇavau brahmaloke tṛtīyasyām ito divi |
GV05chup___u:2343: tad aparājitā pūr brahmaṇaḥ prabhuvimitaṃ hiraṇmayam || ChUp_8,5.3 ||
GV05chup___u:2344: tad ya evaitāv araṃ ca ṇyaṃ cārṇavau brahmaloke brahmacaryeṇānuvindanti teṣām evaiṣa brahmalokaḥ
GV05chup___u:2345: teṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmacāro bhavati || ChUp_8,5.4 ||
GV05chup___u:2346: atha yā etā hṛdayasya nāḍyas tāḥ piṅgalasyāṇimnas tiṣṭhanti śuklasya nīlasya pītasya lohitasyeti
GV05chup___u:2347: asau vādityaḥ piṅgala eṣa śukla eṣa nīla eṣa pīta eṣa lohitaḥ ||
GV05chup___u:2348: tad yathā mahāpatha ātata ubhau grāmau gacchatīmaṃ cāmuṃ caivam evaitā ādityasya raśmaya ubhau lokau gacchantīmaṃ cāmuṃ ca |
GV05chup___u:2349: amuṣmād ādityāt pratāyante tā āsu nāḍīṣu sṛptāḥ |
GV05chup___u:2350: ābhyo nāḍībhyaḥ pratāyante te 'muṣminn āditye sṛptāḥ || ChUp_8,6.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2351: tad yatraitat suptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānāti |
GV05chup___u:2354: tejasā hi tadā saṃpanno bhavati || ChUp_8,6.3 ||
GV05chup___u:2356: tam abhita āsīnā āhur jānāsi māṃ jānāsi mām iti |
GV05chup___u:2357: sa yāvad asmāc charīrād anutkrānto bhavati |
GV05chup___u:2361: sa om iti vā hod vā mīyate |
GV05chup___u:2362: sa yāvat kṣipyen manas tāvad ādityaṃ gacchati |
GV05chup___u:2363: etad vai khalu lokadvāraṃ viduṣāṃ prapadanaṃ nirodho 'viduṣām ||
GV05chup___u:2365: śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyas tāsāṃ mūrdhānam abhiniḥsṛtaikā |
GV05chup___u:2366: tayordhvam āyann amṛtatvam eti viṣvaṅṅ anyā utkramaṇe bhavanty utkramaṇe bhavanti || ChUp_8,6.6
GV05chup___u:2367: ya ātmā apahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2368: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānātīti ha prajāpatir uvāca || ChUp_8,7.1 ||
GV05chup___u:2370: te hocur hanta tam ātmaānam anvecchāmo yam ātmānam anviṣya sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān iti |
GV05chup___u:2372: tau hāsaṃvidānāv eva samitpāṇī prajāpatisakāśam ājagmatuḥ || ChUp_8,7.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2373: tau ha dvātriṃśataṃ varṣāṇi brahmacaryam ūṣatuḥ |
GV05chup___u:2376: tau hocatur ya ātmā apahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso
GV05chup___u:2378: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānātīti bhagavato vaco vedayante |
GV05chup___u:2380: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca ya eṣo 'kṣiṇi puruṣo dṛṣyata eṣa ātmeti hovāca |
GV05chup___u:2382: atha yo 'yaṃ bhagavo 'psu parikhyāyate yaś cāyam ādarśe katama eṣa iti |
GV05chup___u:2383: eṣa u evaiṣu sarveṣvannteṣu parikhyāyata iti hovāca || ChUp_8,7.4 ||
GV05chup___u:2384: udaśarāva ātmānam avekṣya yad ātmano na vijānīthas tan me prabrūtam iti |
GV05chup___u:2386: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca kiṃ paśyatha iti |
GV05chup___u:2387: tau hocatuḥ sarvam evedam āvāṃ bhagava ātmānaṃ paśyāva ā lomabhyaḥ ā nakhebhyaḥ pratirūpam iti || ChUp_8,8.1 ||
GV05chup___u:2388: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau bhūtvodaśarāve 'vekṣethām iti
GV05chup___u:2389: tau ha sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau bhūtvodaśarāve 'vekṣāṃ cakrāte
GV05chup___u:2390: tau ha prajāpatir uvāca kiṃ paśyatha iti || ChUp_8,8.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2391: tau hocatur yathaivedam āvāṃ bhagavaḥ sādhvalaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtau sva evam evemau bhagavaḥ sādhvallaṃkṛtau suvasanau pariṣkṛtāv iti |
GV05chup___u:2396: anupalabhyātmānam ananuvidya vrajato yatara etadupaniṣado bhaviṣyanti devā vā asurā vā te parābhaviṣyantīti |
GV05chup___u:2397: sa ha śāntahṛdaya eva virocano 'surāñ jagāma |
GV05chup___u:2398: tebhyo haitām upaniṣadaṃ provāca ātmaiveha mahayya ātmā paricaryaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2399: ātmānam eveha mahayann ātmānaṃ paricarann ubhau lokāv āpnotīmaṃ cāmuṃ ceti
GV05chup___u:2400: tasmād apyaddyehādadānam aśraddadhānam ayajamānam āhur āsuro bateti |
GV05chup___u:2403: etena hy ammuṃ lokaṃ jeṣyanto manyante || ChUp_8,8.5 ||
GV05chup___u:2404: atha hendro 'prāpyaiva devān etad bhayaṃ dadarśa |
GV05chup___u:2405: yathaiva khalv ayam asmiñ charīre sādhvalaṃkṛte sādhvalaṃkṛto bhavati suvasane suvasanaḥ pariṣkṛte pariṣkṛta evam evāyam asminn andhe 'ndho
GV05chup___u:2407: asyaiva śarīrasya nāśam anv eṣa naśyati |
GV05chup___u:2411: maghavan yac chāntahṛdayaḥ prāvrājīḥ sārdhaṃ virocanena kim icchan punar āgama iti |
GV05chup___u:2412: sa hovāca yathā eva khalvayyaṃ bhagavo 'smiñ charīre sādhvalaṃkṛte sādhvalaṃkṛto bhavati suvasane suvasanaḥ pariṣkṛte pariṣkṛta evam evāyam asminn andhe 'ndho bhavati srāme srāmaḥ parivṛkṇe parivṛkṇaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2413: asyaiva śarīrasya nāśam anv eṣa naśyati |
GV05chup___u:2420: ya eṣa svapne mahīyamānaś caraty eṣa ātmeti hovāca |
GV05chup___u:2423: sa hāprāpyaiva devān etad bhayaṃ dadarśa |
GV05chup___u:2424: tad yady apīdaṃ śarīram andhaṃ bhavaty anandhaḥ sa bhavati yadi srāmam asrāmaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2431: api roditīva nāham atra bhogyaṃ paśyāmīti || ChUp_8,10.2 ||
GV05chup___u:2434: maghavan yac chāntahṛdayaḥ prāvrājīḥ kim icchan punar āgama iti |
GV05chup___u:2436: tad yady apīdaṃ bhagavaḥ śarīram andhaṃ bhavaty anandhaḥ sa bhavati yadi srāmam asrāmaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2450: tad yatraitat suptaḥ samastaḥ saṃprasannaḥ svapnaṃ na vijānātyeṣa ātmeti hovāca |
GV05chup___u:2453: sa hāprāpyaiva devān etad bhayaṃ dadarśa |
GV05chup___u:2454: nāha khalv ayam evaṃ saṃpraty ātmānaṃ jānāty ayam aham asmīti |
GV05chup___u:2459: taṃ ha prajāpatir uvāca - maghavan yac chāntahṛdayaḥ prāvrājīḥ kim icchan
GV05chup___u:2461: sa hovāca nāha khalv ayaṃ bhagava evaṃ saṃpraty ātmānaṃ jānāty ayam aham asmīti |
GV05chup___u:2472: ekaśataṃ ha vai varṣāṇi maghavān prajāpatau brahmacaryam uvāsa |
GV05chup___u:2474: maghavan martyaṃ vā idaṃ śarīram āttaṃ mṛtyunā |
GV05chup___u:2477: na vai saśarīrasya sataḥ priyāpriyayor apahatir asti |
GV05chup___u:2478: aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ || ChUp_8,12.1 ||
GV05chup___u:2481: tad yathaitāny amuṣmād ākāśāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyante evam evaiṣa saṃprasādo 'smāc charīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate
GV05chup___u:2483: sa tatra paryeti jakṣat krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ strībhir vā yānair vā jñātibhir vā nopajanaṃ smarann idaṃ śarīram |
GV05chup___u:2484: sa yathā prayogya ācaraṇe yukta evam evāyam asmiñ charīre prāṇo yuktaḥ ||
GV05chup___u:2485: atha yatraitad ākāśam anuviṣaṇṇaṃ cakṣuḥ sa cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣo darśanāya cakṣuḥ |
GV05chup___u:2486: atha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā gandhāya ghrāṇam |
GV05chup___u:2487: atha yo vededam abhivyāharāṇīti sa ātmā abhivyāhārāya vāk |
GV05chup___u:2488: atha yo vededaṃ śṛṇvānīti sa ātmā śravaṇāya śrotram || ChUp_8,12.4 ||
GV05chup___u:2489: atha yo vededaṃ manvānīti sa ātmā |
GV05chup___u:2491: sa vā eṣa etena daivena cakṣuṣā manasaitān kāmān paśyan ramate ya ete brahmaloke || ChUp_8,12.5
GV05chup___u:2492: taṃ vā etaṃ devā ātmānam upāsate |
GV05chup___u:2493: tasmāt teṣāṃ sarve ca lokā āttāḥ sarve ca kāmāḥ |
GV05chup___u:2494: sa sarvāṃś ca lokān āpnoti sarvāṃś ca kāmān yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānāti |
GV05chup___u:2495: iti ha prajāpatir uvāca prajāpatir uvāca || ChUp_8,12.6 ||
GV05chup___u:2498: aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpaṃ candra iva rāhor mukhāt pramucya dhūtvā śarīram akṛtaṃ kṛtātmā brahmalokam abhisaṃbhavāmīty abhisaṃbhavāmīti ||
GV05chup___u:2500: te yadantarā tad brahma tad amṛtaṃ sa ātmā |
GV05chup___u:2501: prajāpateḥ sabhāṃ veśma prapadye yaśo 'haṃ bhavāmi brāhmaṇānāṃ yaśo rājñām yaśo viśām |
GV05chup___u:2504: śyetam adatkam adatkaṃ śyetaṃ lindu mābhigāṃ lindu mābhigām || ChUp_8,14.1
GV05chup___u:2505: tad dhaitad brahmā prajāpataya uvāca prajāpatir manave manuḥ prajābhyaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2506: ācāryakulād vedam adhītya yathāvidhānaṃ guroḥ karmātiśeṣeṇābhisamāvṛtya kuṭumbe śucau deśe svādhyāyam adhīyāno dharmikān vidadhad ātmani sarvendriyāṇi saṃpratiṣṭhāpyāhiṃsan sarvabhūtāny anyatra tīrthebhyaḥ |
GV05chup___u:2507: sa khalv evaṃ vartayan yāvad āyuṣaṃ brahmalokam abhisaṃpadyate |
GV05chup___u:2508: na ca punar āvartate na ca punar āvartate || ChUp_8,15.1 ||
